name: Nightmare of Weakest Creature
description:
Eika Ebisu wakes up in hell, convinced that she is in a nightmare. Explore the desolate area, meeting interesting characters and learning more about the world you have been thrust into, solving puzzles along the way. Discover Eika's past, and her potential future in "Nightmare of Weakest Creature".

Made for "Touhou Fan Game Jam 8" in four days. 

(Sprites referenced from https://rpgmaker.net/games/6232/)
